      • getSPConnectedRouteTasks

        public static java.lang.String getSPConnectedRouteTasks​(matrix.db.Context context,
                                                        java.lang.String inputData)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        The method creates the JSON object to get the list of Study Protocol associated with the user. the input parameters are:
        Parameters:
        context - The enovia Context object
        args - the type, name, revision and where clause,allowed state can be configured and sent as input to get the desired list of the objects to be displayed
        Returns:
        JSON object consisting of the information to be displayed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When operation fails

      • getRouteTasks

        public static java.lang.String getRouteTasks​(matrix.db.Context context,
                                             java.lang.String inputData)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        The method creates the JSON array to get the list of Inbox Tasks assigned to context user
        Parameters:
        context - The enovia Context object
        args - ObjectsSelects, Duration, Limit, whereExpression, contentType
        Returns:
        JSON array consisting of the information to be displayed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When operation fails

      • getTaskInfo

        public static java.lang.String getTaskInfo​(matrix.db.Context context,
                                           java.lang.String inputData)
        The method creates the JSON Object to get the passed Inbox Task Info
        Parameters:
        context - The enovia Context object
        args - ObjectsSelects, TaskId
        Returns:
        JSON Object consisting of the information to be displayed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When operation fails
